title: Physics
description: Explore the fundamentals of Physics, from motion and energy to forces, with courses designed to build a strong foundation and enhance problem-solving skills

courses.title: Physics for Grade 9
courses.decription: Grade 9 Physics introduces fundamental concepts such as motion, energy, and forces. Students explore basic principles and engage in hands-on experiments to understand the physical world...

courses.title: Physics for Grade 10
courses.decription: Grade 10 Physics deepens understanding of energy transfer, waves, and electrical circuits. Students apply theoretical knowledge to real-life situations through practical experiments and problem-solving...

courses.title: Physics for Grade 11
courses.decription: Grade 11 Physics covers more advanced topics, including mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism. Students develop critical thinking and analytical skills through complex experiments and theoretical challenges...
